dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 4648 RH: Cane River Creole National Historical Park Boundary Modification Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Johnson of Louisiana introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on July 22, 2021

form.official-title: To modify the boundary of the Cane River Creole National Historical Park in the State of Louisiana, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Cane River Creole National Historical Park Boundary Modification Act.

section.header: Cane River Creole National Historical Park boundary modification
section.text: Section 303(b) of the Cane River Creole National Historical Park and National Heritage Area Act (16 U.S.C. 410ccc–1(b)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: The approximately 46.1 acres of land identified as Proposed Addition as generally depicted on the map entitled Cane River Creole National Historical Park Proposed Addition - Magnolia Unit, numbered 494/176,958, and dated October 2021.

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
